io.github.zachohara.bukkit.craftban

Class MaterialsListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.zachohara.bukkit.craftban.MaterialsListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Listener

    public class MaterialsListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.bukkit.event.Listener
    A MaterialsListener is a Listener that listens for inventory clicks and crafting, and determines if the given event should be blocked due to banned materials being used.
    Author:
    Zach Ohara

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MaterialsListener.ScheduledInventoryCheck
      A ScheduledInventoryCheck is constructed with any given InventoryClickEvent.

    • Method Detail

      • onCraftItem

        public void onCraftItem(org.bukkit.event.inventory.CraftItemEvent event)
        Checks the situation involved in a CraftItemEvent to make sure the all the involved materials are allowed to be crafted.
        Parameters:
        event - the CraftItemEvent triggered by a player crafting something.

      • onInventoryClick

        public void onInventoryClick(org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryClickEvent event)
        Schedules a task for the next 'tick' that will check the contents of a furnace. The scheduling is necessary instead of checking now, because if the click event was a player placing an item into a furnace, the item will not be registered with the furnace until the next tick.
        Parameters:
        event - the InventoryClickEvent triggered by a player clicking anywhere in their inventory.

      • checkInventoryEvent

        private static boolean checkInventoryEvent(org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryClickEvent event)
        Checks that an InventoryClickEvent does not use banned materials, and handles any consequences of an event that does use banned materials.
        Parameters:
        event - the event to check.
        Returns:
        true if the event did not involve the use of any banned materials, or false if the event did use banned materials and the consequences were handled accordingly.

      • checkItemStackContents

        private static boolean checkItemStackContents(java.lang.String banlist,
                                              org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack stack,
                                              org.bukkit.entity.Player clicker,
                                              java.lang.String reportActivity)
        Checks that a given ItemStack material is not banned from the given activity. If the material is banned, this method will report the misuse to the player who attempted the activity, and to all the admins on the server.
        Parameters:
        banlist - the name of the activty to check the material against.
        stack - the material to check.
        clicker - the player that tried to do the activity.
        reportActivity - the name of the activity, in a form that will be reported to the admins and to the player.
        Returns:
        true if no banned materials were found, or false if banned materials were found, and appropriate messages were sent to the player and to the admins.

      • removeOffendingItem

        private static void removeOffendingItem(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory removefrom,
                                        org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack stack,
                                        org.bukkit.entity.Player returnto)
        Moves the given ItemStack out of the given inventory, and into the inventory of the given player.
        Parameters:
        removefrom - the Inventory to remove the given ItemStack from.
        stack - the ItemStack to move.
        returnto - the Player to move the given ItemStack to.

      • reportBannedMaterial

        private static void reportBannedMaterial(org.bukkit.entity.Player clicker,
                                         java.lang.String material,
                                         java.lang.String reportActivity)
        Reports a banned material being used for the given activity, by the given player. Appropriate messages will be sent to the offending player, and to the admins of the server.
        Parameters:
        clicker - the Player that tried to use the given banned material.
        material - the name of the material that was used.
        reportActivity - the activity that the player attempted but was blocked from.
